mapper.insert: insert into member(user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_gender, user_birth, user_email, email_code, user_phone, user_charicon) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userEmail}, #{emailCode}, #{userPhone}, #{userCharIcon})
mapper.update: update member set user_pwd = #{userPwd}, user_name = #{userName}, user_gender = #{userGender}, user_birth = #{userBirth}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_phone = #{userPhone} where user_id = #{userId}
